entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
